settings.c1_text:
CAN I MAKE A RETURN OR EXCHANGE?: Due to limited quantity and high demand all purchases are final sale.

DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?: We provide both U.S. and international shipping.

WHAT IS THE SIZING LIKE?: All items fit true to size.
